alert.note: Alert for Luzerne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 3:50PM EDT until September 07 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL LUZERNE AND SOUTHERN WYOMING COUNTIES... At 350 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harveys Lake, or 12 miles southwest of Tunkhannock, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Falls, Plymouth, Vernon, Larksville, Lehman, Dallas, Harveys Lake, Orange, Noxen, and Courtdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
